misc: If not on the course, he is probably billing clients
biography: Lassi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his ninth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, Lassi is known for his calculated approach to the game, a trait perhaps honed by his profession as a lawyer.

While he is yet to claim the coveted Hector Trophée, his past performances, including one Victor Trophy, underscore his capabilities on the course. Lassi brings a unique blend of analytical prowess and competitive spirit to the greens.

Away from the golf course, Lassi is likely engrossed in the intricacies of legal work, diligently billing clients. His commitment to both his profession and his passion for golf is a testament to his disciplined nature. Opponents would be wise to note that Lassi's precision on the fairway is matched only by his acumen in the courtroom.
